title: Black Double-Breasted Longline Coat
description: This coat from Antony Morato is a perfect blend of style and comfort. Wear it with a shirt pair of jeans and boots for a stylish look.

specs.Fabric:
Shell: 61% wool, 29% polyester, 4% acrylic, 3% viscose, and 3% polyamide.
Lining 1: 52% polyester, 48% viscose.
Lining 2: 100% polyester
specs.details: Black longline coat, has a notched lapel, double-breasted with button closures, long sleeves button closures, structured shoulders, three pockets, an attached lining with a welt pocket, and a vented back hem.
